facts.text: St Fabian ends his reign as Catholic Pope (236-50)
Giovanni di Sabina elected Pope Sylvester III
According to legend, freeholder Lalli slays English crusader Bishop Henry with an axe on the ice of lake Köyliönjärvi in Finland.
The first Parliament of England summoned other than by royal command (in this instance by Simon de Montfort, Earl of Leicester) met in Westminster Hall
Duke Wladyslaw Lokietek becomes king of Poland
Edward Balliol abdicates as King of Scots.
The present-day location of Rio de Janeiro is first explored.
Casa Contratacion (Board of Trade) found (Spain) to deal with American affairs
Christian II succeeds Johan I as Danish/Norwegian king
Christian II is forced to abdicate as King of Denmark and Norway.
The Mexican city of León is founded by order of the viceroy Don Martín Enríquez de Almansa.
Peace of Knarodends War of Kalmar between Denmark & Sweden
Treaty of Andrussovo-ends 13 year war between Poland & Russia
1st American military court martial trial begins, Cambridge, Mass
1st edition of Pieter It Hoens "Post of Neder-Rhijn" published
Samuel Ellis advertises to sell Oyster Island (Ellis Is), no takers
Pioneer African Baptist church organizes in Savannah, Ga
